embed.title: 🎭 Partner Collection: Antonio
embed.description:
**Antonio** takes the stage with the Bandits!
Among them, 15 lucky members will receive **1 whitelist** 
— [check out the announcement on X](https://x.com/monad_bandit/status/XXXXX).

🔗 Don't forget to save your wallet : **`/savewallet <your-address>`**.

> _“All the chain’s a stage…”_
